text: isamen shaq nahin ki mera paravaradigaar bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai aur baadashaah ne hukm diya ki yoosuph ko mere paas le aao to main unako apane zaatee kaam ke lie khaas kar loonga phir usane yoosuph se baaten kee to yoosuph kee aala qaabaliyat saabit huee (aur) usane hukm diya ki tum aaj (se) hamaare sarakaar mein yaqeen baavaqaar (aur) muatabar ho
